Title: Establishes certain contract requirements involving glazing work
Summary: Establishes certain contract requirements involving glazing work; provides that certain contracts over one million and five million dollars that include glazing work to be performed outside of a city with a population of one million or more shall require such work be performed by North American Contractor Certification ("NACC") certified companies; defines glazing work.
LawCode: Add ยง136-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing certain contract requirements involving glazing work
